title: Foods to Rejuvenate Our Bodies, with Dr. William Li
description:
Jillian kicks off a 4-week series with Dr. William Li, beginning with Regenerative Foods that mobilize stem cells to help rebuild muscle and repair damage to our bodies. Plus, how the all-or-nothing mentality is counter intuitive to making progress in your workout, your diet, and your life.

Guest Links:

Eat to Beat Disease: The New Science of How Your Body Can Heal Itself:

https://www.amazon.com/dp/1538714620/?ref=exp_drwilliamli_dp_vv_d

Instagram: @DrWilliamLi

Get the newsletter at: DrWilliamLi.com


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy


This Week’s Sponsors:

JENNIKAYNE.com, promo code Jillian for 20% off your first order

JENNYLIFE.com/JILLIAN for a life insurance quote

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
